original_text: Then he took the seven loaves and the fish, and when he had given thanks, he broke them and gave them to the disciples, and they in turn to the people.
korean_text: 떡 일곱 개와 그 생선을 가지사 축사하시고 떼어 제자들에게 주시니 제자들이 무리에게 주매

sentences.original_text: Then he took the seven loaves and the fish
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그가 떡 일곱 개와 물고기를 가져왔고

sentences.original_text: and when he had given thanks
he broke them and gave them to the disciples
and they in turn to the people
